item.title: What's in your wastewater?
item.description: Would you believe medications flushed down the toilet can actually be read in our wastewater facility? Pills do not dissolve as quickly as you may think, and that may be a good thing. While a recent event allowed a municipal employee to be able to identify a particular medication type that came through our treatment facility, the real story is that this happened at all. Disposing of things can be tricky business.
